name: 06 - Destination Recommendation (AI Models)
description: This feature flag will change AI models in real-time for the destination recommendation component in LaunchAirways.

variations.name: Claude Haiku
variations.description: This is Claude Haiku's AI model for quick response and cost saving

variations.name: Cohere Text
variations.description: This is Cohere's AI model for detailed response with cost of high tokens
